metadata.title: CVE-2024-42140 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:riscv: kexec: Avoid deadlock in kexec crash pathIf the kexec crash code is called in the interrupt context, themachine_kexec_mask_interrupts() function will trigger a deadlock whiletrying to acquire the irqdesc spinlock and then deactivate irqchip inirq_set_irqchip_state() function.Unlike arm64, riscv only requires irq_eoi handler to complete EOI andkeeping irq_set_irqchip_state() will only leave this possible deadlockwithout any use. So we simply remove it.
